displayProperties.name: Enduring Snare
displayProperties.description: Snareweaver traps last longer.

displayProperties.name: Attrition Orbs
displayProperties.description: Dealing sustained damage creates a slightly improved Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Horde Shuttle
displayProperties.description: Damaging unraveled targets with a weapon occasionally spawns a threadling.

displayProperties.name: Hail The Storm
displayProperties.description:
Shattering encased targets and Stasis crystals deals increased damage.

Shattering Stasis crystals releases shards of ice that damage and slow targets.
Firing a Rocket Launcher consumes one stack of Armor Charge, granting increased damage and reload speed until you reload or stow your Rocket Launcher.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Kickstart
displayProperties.description: When your grenade energy is fully expended, your Armor Charge is consumed and you gain grenade energy for each Armor Charge used.

displayProperties.name: Third Tail
displayProperties.description: Adds another rocket to the volley that deals Arc damage and jolts combatants.

displayProperties.name: Composite Propellant
displayProperties.description: Rockets eject burning fuel.

displayProperties.name: Aeon's Vow
displayProperties.description: Gain class ability energy and take reduced damage from combatants for a short time when an ally dies or when you resurrect an ally.

displayProperties.name: Lightgiver Chant
displayProperties.description: Nearby critically wounded allies take reduced damage from combatants. Nearby Aeon Cult allies who do not have the Sect of Vigor role equipped also gain class ability energy while critically wounded.

displayProperties.name: Rocket-Assisted Frame
displayProperties.description: Sidearm fires self-propelled rocket ammunition. Projectiles explode on impact for high damage.

displayProperties.name: From Whence You Came
displayProperties.description: Increases ability damage to Taken and Scorn combatants.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization I
displayProperties.description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Sundering, Nano-Munitions, and Nanotech Tracer Rockets Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

displayProperties.name: Flame, Fiber, and Freeze
displayProperties.description: Combines the Solar/Strand and Solar/Stasis Siphon mods into one.

displayProperties.name: Blast Radius
displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows with Rocket Launchers and Grenade Launchers grant Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Kindling Trigger
displayProperties.description: Radiant causes Solar weapons to apply scorch to unscorched combatants.

displayProperties.name: Hungering Quarrel
displayProperties.description: Double fires tracking bolts that leech health.

displayProperties.name: Armsbearer Chant
displayProperties.description: When you use a finisher on an Elite, you generate Special ammo for your fireteam; when you use a finisher on a boss or miniboss, you generate Heavy ammo for your fireteam. Nearby Aeon Cult allies who do not have the Sect of Insight role equipped also gain a burst of Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Prosperity
displayProperties.description: Achieving victory in ritual activities grants a chance to drop an additional piece of Legendary gear.

displayProperties.name: Revitalizing Blast
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with a Solar ability weakens Champions and bosses for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Pillar of Ice
displayProperties.description: Defeating an encased combatant spawns Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Unravelling Orbs
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Strand weapons Unraveling Rounds.

displayProperties.name: Dragon's Bite
displayProperties.description:
Breaking a combatant's shield with a Strand or Stasis weapon has a chance to suspend or freeze that combatant. 

Wearing Season of the Wish armor increases this chance.

displayProperties.name: Overload Rocket Launchers
displayProperties.description: Rocket Launchers are especially affective against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization I
displayProperties.description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Sundering, Nano-Munitions, and Nanotech Tracer Rockets Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

displayProperties.name: From Whence You Came
displayProperties.description: Increases ability damage to Taken and Scorn combatants.

displayProperties.name: Flame, Fiber, and Freeze
displayProperties.description: Combines the Solar/Strand and Solar/Stasis Siphon mods into one.

displayProperties.name: Kindling Trigger
displayProperties.description: Radiant causes Solar weapons to apply scorch to unscorched combatants.

displayProperties.name: Blast Radius
displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows with Rocket Launchers and Grenade Launchers grant Armor Charge.

displayProperties.name: Core Harvest
displayProperties.description: Earn bonus Enhancement Cores when completing ritual activities.

displayProperties.name: Prism Harvest
displayProperties.description: Earn bonus Enhancement Prisms when completing ritual activities.

displayProperties.name: Heat Sink
displayProperties.description: Overheat damage is reduced while not aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Impact Induction
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with a powered melee attack reduces your grenade cooldown.

displayProperties.name: Dragon's Vengeance
displayProperties.description: When an ally dies or you reach critical health, this weapon's magazine refills, and it gains bonus range, charge rate, and handling.

displayProperties.name: High Octane
displayProperties.description: Igniting nearby targets partially replenishes fuel. This weapon refills itself from reserves upon gaining maximum fuel.

displayProperties.name: Torch
displayProperties.description: While radiant, deal increased weapon damage to combatants affected by Strand and Stasis debuffs.

displayProperties.name: Heart of the Flame
displayProperties.description: Casting your Solar Super grants nearby allies radiant and increases the damage of your Super for each nearby ally.

displayProperties.name: Flint Striker
displayProperties.description: Rapid Solar weapon precision hits and rapid Solar weapon final blows grant Radiant.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization II
displayProperties.description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Noble Deeds, Unsated Hunger, Head Rush, and Dragon's Vengeance Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

displayProperties.name: Wished into Being
displayProperties.description:
While your Super is nearly fully-charged, ability final blows spawn Orbs of Power.  

Wearing Season of the Wish armor decreases Super amount threshold.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization I
displayProperties.description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits.

displayProperties.name: Modularity
displayProperties.description: Achieving victory in ritual activities grants a chance to award an Upgrade Module.

displayProperties.name: Refined Soul
displayProperties.description: Grants bonus range and stability. Dealing a final blow or absorbing a Remnant grants additional increased weapon range, as well as increased mobility and handling for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Overload Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description: Sustained fire from Pulse Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Auto Rifle
displayProperties.description: Sustained fire from Auto Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Sidearms
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Sidearms fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Sidearms are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Bow
displayProperties.description: Holding a Bow fully drawn for a short time loads powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Bows are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Hand Cannons fire staggering rounds and stun [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Focusing Strike
displayProperties.description: Grants class ability energy when you cause damage with a powered melee attack.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization II
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Feed the Void
displayProperties.description:
Defeat a target with a Void ability to activate Devour.

Your Devour effects are improved, restoring additional health and grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Well of Radiance
displayProperties.description: Thrust your sword into the ground, damaging and scorching nearby combatants. The sword projects a continuous aura, granting radiant effects and restoration to nearby allies, protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Hakke Breach Armaments
displayProperties.description:
This weapon deals increased damage against vehicles and constructs.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

displayProperties.name: Foebreaker Chant
displayProperties.description: Stunning a Champion or landing rapid precision hits on a powerful combatant will mark them. Your allies deal increased damage to marked combatants. When a combatant is first marked, nearby Aeon Cult allies who do not have the Sect of Force role equipped gain grenade and melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Permeability
displayProperties.description: Using your class ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow the weapon.

displayProperties.name: Advanced Reflexes
displayProperties.description: Upon taking damage from a target, quickly guard or aim down sights with this weapon to gain bonus mobility, handling, and charge rate for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Manifested Power
displayProperties.description: Adds a powerful appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Violent Reanimation
displayProperties.description: Multiple final blows with this weapon grant Devour to the wielder.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Attrition Orbs
displayProperties.description: Dealing sustained damage creates an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Onslaught
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase its rate of fire.

displayProperties.name: Snowstorm
displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants to generate snowballs.

displayProperties.name: Tithing Harvest
displayProperties.description: While Creeping Attrition is active, destroying Stasis crystals or landing precision final blows creates a Stasis shard. The Stasis shard returns to you, and collecting Stasis shards refills the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Noble Deeds
displayProperties.description: Gain charges by assisting your allies with revives, healing, overshields, and subclass buffs. Consume charges by defeating combatants. While charged, this weapon is granted bonus handling, reload speed, and sword charge rate.

displayProperties.name: Beacon Rounds
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant your projectiles tracking for an improved duration. Dealing further damage extends the duration.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization II
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Deconstruct
displayProperties.description:
Dealing sustained damage grants bonus damage against constructs for an improved duration and partially refills the magazine from reserves. Damage with Primary ammo or against constructs provides additional progress.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.

displayProperties.name: Overload Rocket Launchers
displayProperties.description: Rocket Launchers are especially affective against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Dragon's Bite
displayProperties.description:
Breaking a combatant's shield with a Strand or Stasis weapon has a chance to suspend or freeze that combatant. 

Wearing Season of the Wish armor increases this chance.

displayProperties.name: Pillar of Ice
displayProperties.description: Defeating an encased combatant spawns Stasis crystals.
Causing damage with a Solar ability weakens Champions and bosses for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Unravelling Orbs
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Strand weapons Unraveling Rounds.

displayProperties.name: Boon of Friendship
displayProperties.description:
Grants a Dawning reward to your fireteam upon completion of a playlist activity, with additional rewards based on the number of players with Boons active.

Effect lasts until a reward is earned. Only one Boon of Friendship may be active per player.

displayProperties.name: Onslaught
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase its rate of fire for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Permeability
displayProperties.description:
Using your class ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow the weapon.
Improves handling.

displayProperties.name: One Quiet Moment
displayProperties.description: Grants increased reload speed and handling when out of combat. Swords gain faster movement speed.

displayProperties.name: Heat of the Moment
displayProperties.description: While Ignition Trigger is active, your health recovers more quickly, and sustained fire scorches your target.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer
displayProperties.description: An ally is using Enhanced Cheer, granting all members of your fireteam the chance to gain additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.

displayProperties.name: Slice
displayProperties.description: Casting your class ability allows this weapon to sever targets on hit for an improved duration, up to a maximum number of targets.

displayProperties.name: Insatiable
displayProperties.description: Ability energy for you and allies on Super cast.

displayProperties.name: Origin Hones
displayProperties.description: Weapons with the Noble Deeds, Nanotracing Rockets, Tex Balanced Stock, and Ambush Origin Traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Slice
displayProperties.description: Casting your class ability allows this weapon to sever targets on hit for a brief duration, up to a maximum number of targets.

displayProperties.name: Overload Auto Rifle
displayProperties.description: Sustained fire from Auto Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description: Sustained fire from Pulse Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Piercing Sidearms
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Sidearms fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Sidearms are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description: Aiming down the sights of a Hand Cannon for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Bow
displayProperties.description: Holding a Bow fully drawn for a short time loads powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Bows are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Festive Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a festive appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Multi-Threaded Snare
displayProperties.description: Snareweaver traps can suspend more targets.

displayProperties.name: Phosphene Stimulus
displayProperties.description: Adds a phosphene appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Inflorescence
displayProperties.description: Adds an inflorescence appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Snareweaver
displayProperties.description: Create traps that suspend targets.

displayProperties.name: Wished into Being
displayProperties.description:
While your Super is nearly fully-charged, ability final blows spawn Orbs of Power.  

Wearing Season of the Wish armor decreases Super amount threshold.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization II
displayProperties.description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Noble Deeds, Unsated Hunger, Head Rush, and Dragon's Vengeance Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

displayProperties.name: Heart of the Flame
displayProperties.description: Casting your Solar Super grants nearby allies radiant and increases the damage of your Super for each nearby ally.

displayProperties.name: Torch
displayProperties.description: While radiant, deal increased weapon damage to combatants affected by Strand and Stasis debuffs.

displayProperties.name: Flint Striker
displayProperties.description: Rapid Solar weapon precision hits and rapid Solar weapon final blows grant Radiant.

displayProperties.name: Beacon Rounds
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant your projectiles tracking. Dealing further damage extends the duration.

displayProperties.name: Melee Kickstart
displayProperties.description: When your melee energy is fully expended, your Armor Charge is consumed and you gain melee energy for each Armor Charge used.

displayProperties.name: Pyromancer
displayProperties.description: This weapon replenishes its fuel faster. Defeating targets with this weapon causes them to periodically drop Firesprites.

displayProperties.name: Defiant Armory
displayProperties.description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Noble Deeds, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Tex Balanced Stock, and Ambush Origin Traits.

displayProperties.name: Origin Perk Specialization I
displayProperties.description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits.

displayProperties.name: Utility Kickstart
displayProperties.description: When your class ability energy is fully expended, your Armor Charge is consumed and you gain class ability energy for each Armor Charge used.

displayProperties.name: Reaper
displayProperties.description: Shortly after using your class ability, your next weapon final blow spawns an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Focusing Strike
displayProperties.description: Grants class ability energy when you cause damage with a powered melee attack.

displayProperties.name: Restoration Ritual
displayProperties.description: Reviving allies or defeating combatants with finishers reloads this weapon and readies an emergency ammo refill for the next time this weapon runs out of ammo.

You've abandoned your fellow Guardians.

It will take time before others will trust you to respect your Oath for Guided Games.
displayProperties.name: Oath Breaker

displayProperties.description:
You've sworn to uphold Guardian ideals and work as a team to defeat your enemies.

Leaving your team will make you an Oath Breaker.
displayProperties.name: Guardian Oath

displayProperties.description: An ally is using Enhanced Cheer, granting all members of your fireteam the chance to gain additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.
displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer

displayProperties.description: You are using Enhanced Cheer to earn Dawning Essence at an increased rate. Your fireteam has an elevated chance of receiving additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.
displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer

displayProperties.description:
Grants a Dawning reward to your fireteam upon completion of a playlist activity, with additional rewards based on the number of players with Boons active.

Effect lasts until a reward is earned. Only one Boon of Friendship may be active per player.
displayProperties.name: Boon of Friendship
